fields.name: id
fields.title: Id
fields.description: The primary key of repeated reservation.

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: The name of the repeated reservation

fields.name: startDate
fields.title: Start Date
fields.description: The start date of the repeated reservation.

fields.name: reservationType
fields.title: Reservation Type
fields.description: Type of the reservation ( daily , weekly , monthly )

fields.name: duration
fields.title: Duration
fields.description: Duration of the reservation (days, weeks, months according to the reservation type)

fields.name: startTime
fields.title: Start Time
fields.description: The start time of the repeated reservation.

fields.name: timeDuration
fields.title: Time Duration
fields.description: The time duration of the repeated reservation in minutes.

fields.name: status
fields.title: Status
fields.description: Status of the reservation (open or close)
